message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity that I believe will greatly benefit you. Considering its value, I propose a price of $950000 for it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to counteroffer at $850000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but I must respectfully decline. I am unable to lower the price below $900000 due to the value and resources invested into this product. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both our positions.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but I would like to counteroffer at $875000.

I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to consider a price of $925000 for the product. This price reflects its true value while remaining competitive in the market. I look forward to your response.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $890000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $910000 for the product. This still maintains a fair profit margin while considering your offer.
Thank you for your proposal, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $885000.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After reviewing the situation, I am prepared to offer the product at $905000. This price reflects the value of the product while also allowing for a reasonable profit margin.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $895000.
